entry.p: Herewith an update about various further essays of mine on Ayn Rand:

li.p: It's been over three months since the Journal of Ayn Rand Studies published my essay Image and Integration in Ayn Rand's Descriptive Style in Volume 7 Number 2, so I've posted it online under my usual public domain licensing.
My essay "Friendship in Atlas Shrugged" is forthcoming in Ayn Rand's Atlas Shrugged: A Philosophical and Literary Companion, due out in 2007 from Ashgate Publishing.

Chris Sciabarra has informed me that my essay "Nietzsche, Rand, and the Ethics of the Great Task" has been accepted for publication in a forthcoming special issue of the Journal of Ayn Rand Studies on Nietzsche and Rand (due out in 2007, I think).

entry.p: Now I just need to write my projected essay on Aristotle and Rand, which I think will be my last rung on the ladder.
